content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, nice to meet you. Let's start with the rental price. What is your offer? Remember, this is for a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's close to all important facilities like supermarket, public transportation, etc.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see. Considering the location and condition of the apartment, I think a price of 1000 Euros per month would be fair.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: That's a low offer considering the prime location and condition of the apartment. I'm looking for a higher price. Remember, we're discussing the rental price for a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's close to all important facilities like supermarket, public transportation, etc.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, how about 1200 Euros per month? This is a fair price for such a nice apartment in the city center.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: That's better, but I'm still looking for a higher price. Remember, we're discussing the rental price for a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's close to all important facilities like supermarket, public transportation, etc.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Very well, how about 1300 Euros per month? This is a good price for such a nice apartment in the city center.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: That's a better offer, but I'm still looking for a higher price. Remember, we're discussing the rental price for a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's close to all important facilities like supermarket, public transportation, etc.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, how about 1400 Euros per month? This is the highest price I can offer for this apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: That's a good offer, but I'm still looking for a higher price. Remember, we're discussing the rental price for a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's close to all important facilities like supermarket, public transportation, etc.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your desire for a higher price, but 1400 Euros per month is the highest price I can offer for this apartment. If you don't accept this offer, I will have to continue the search for a suitable tenant.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe there is still room for a higher price. Remember, we're discussing the rental price for a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's close to all important facilities like supermarket, public transportation, etc.
